Edition du fichier ~/.config/nautilus/accels

Remplacer
; (gtk_accel_path "<Actions>/DirViewActions/Trash" "<primary>Delete")
Par
(gtk_accel_path "<Actions>/DirViewActions/Trash" "Delete")
